name: Better Days (BrodyA, TheFStrudel, Jade.B.0303)
description:
An adventurer meets his fate when he fails to slay a ferocious beast hiding in the mountains. Their departure from the mortal world presents them with a new challenge, as they must now conquer the afterlife in an attempt to come back to life.

Talk to the locals, complete strange quests, and find a way to live again!

Created by:
Brody Armstrong (Artist)
Jade Béland (Artist)
Dante Bruni (Coder)

Assets Used:
Stylized Lava PBR Texture
FREE Cartoon Halloween Pack - Mobile/VR
Environment Pack: Free Forest Sample
Unity Particle Pack 5.x
Translucent Crystals
POLYGON Knights - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty
Poly Halloween
SIMPLE modular human
Free Animated Monster Pack
SimPoly Town

Music:
Myrrh - Audiorezout (https://www.songtradr.com/songs/audiorezout/myrrh)
In the Branches - Visager (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Visager)
